Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension VistaTM System Drugs of Abuse Calibrator
Methodologies: Calibration of drugs of abuse immunoassays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension VistaTM System Drugs of Abuse Calibrator (UDAT CAL - KC510) for calibrating drugs of abuse immunoassays on the Dimension Vista System
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic calibrator for Amphetamines/Methamphetamines, Barbiturates, Benzodiazepines, Cocaine Metabolite, Methadone, Methaqualone, Opiates, Phencyclidine, Propoxyphene, and Cannabinoids methods on the Dimension Vista System
